about_the_game:
Original soundtrack of TIMEframe. Featuring beautiful strings, piano, and guitar, composed by Clark Aboud.

  • The Ascendant Spire - 01:15
  • The Age of Affirmation - 01:43

  • When All Is Dust - 01:11

[…]\Steam\steamapps\common\TIMEframe\Soundtrack
